columns.text:
Villa Portara, which took its name from the most famous monument of Naxos, will thrill you with its gorgeous views and it will spoil you with direct access to the swimming pool, the barbecue and the outdoor comfortable and luxurious seating areas. 

Don’t hesitate to look in the cupboards for whatever you need as we have tried to provide a maximum of supplies for you. Reserve villa Portara for families or groups of up to 7 visitors.

Room total:85 sq.m
Up to 7 Guests/ sea view

• Cleaning every day
  • Bed sheets change every 2 days
  • Free wifi
  • Flat-screen satellite tv
  • Air conditioning
  • Full kitchen cooking equipment
  • Dish washer
  • Oven
  • Microwave
  • Coffee machine
  • Fridge
  • Washing machine
  • Iron with iron board
  • Bathroom and pool towels
  • Dryer
  • Fireplace
  • Safe Box
  • Swimming pool
  • Barbecue
  • Outside seating space with pool and sea view
  • Parking
  • Storage space

items.description: One of the Top 2 most spacious residences of Apricot & Sea, Maisonette Emery with its 110 square meters provides you with all the space you need in order to enjoy your vacation in full comfort.

items.seo_title: Maisonette Villa Emery | Apricot & Sea Luxury Villas Naxos
items.seo_description: Maisonetter Villa Emery is a charming 110 sq.m space for up to 9 guests. Fully-equipped kitchen. Access to pool & barbecue. Unique sea views. Book now!
items.small_info: Up to 9 Guests/ pool and sea view

SEO.title: Villa Portara | Rooms | Apricot & Sea Luxury Villas Naxos
SEO.description: Villa Portara has an 85 sq.m interior for up to 7 guests, with a fully-equipped kitchen, direct access to the swimming pool & barbecue. Sea views. Book today!
